summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning and to uses in the City's street rights-of-way, providing for a permitting and approval system for monorail transit facilities as may be proposed by a city transportation authority; amending Seattle Municipal Code sections 23.41.004, 23.47.012, 23.49.011, 23.50.028, 23.76.004, 23.80.004, 23.84.006, 23.84.010, 23.84.025, 23.84.038; and adding a new chapter 15.54 to the Seattle Municipal Code.
